long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Used with the NopoNet a free, open source, not for profit, parental control software. NopoNet is a 3rd party application that runs on the users computer and acts as a proxy that blocks websites, when the website is blocked, chrome returns ERR_EMPTY_RESPONSE.  Instead of the website displaying the ERR_EMPTY_RESPONSE page, a custom html file is displayed instead showing a blue hedgehog waving his finger back and fourth saying no.
